name: test-qrvey
description: This project conatins the backend code for an serverless aplication

scripts.packDB: dotenv cross-var cd database/ && npm run-script build && sam package --s3-bucket %QRVEY_BUCKET_NAME% --template-file dynamo_db.yaml --output-template-file dynamo_db-pack.yaml
scripts.deplDB: dotenv cross-var cd database/ && sam deploy --template-file dynamo_db-pack.yaml --stack-name %STACK_DB_NAME% --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.pack: dotenv cross-var npm run-script build && sam package --s3-bucket %QRVEY_BUCKET_NAME% --template-file qrvey.yaml --output-template-file qrvey-pack.yaml
scripts.depl: dotenv cross-var sam deploy --template-file  qrvey-pack.yaml --s3-bucket %QRVEY_BUCKET_NAME% --stack-name %STACK_NAME_BASE% --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --no-fail-on-empty-changeset
scripts.postbuild: (cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && npm install --only=production)
